name: The lions Den
description:
This is an 18+ game! please do not play if you are not of age.
This is a vore game, don't play it if you don't like vore.
I put a bit more work into this one to make it better and have more polish so let me know what you think and what can be better.
its about a dragon coming into a coffee shop and meeting a lion, sex and vore follow
